what: Length-based Evaluation of Fish Stock and Fishery
title: Length-based Evaluation of Fish Stock and Fishery
text: repository contains code documentation fishLengthAssess R package. fishLengthAssess acts aggregator length-based stock assessment models. package imposes standardized formatting metadata structure length data sets, can used variety length-based assessment methods aggregated within package. also provides wrapper functions link standardized formatting length data sets external R packages contain length-based assessment methods (e.g. LBSPR package).

title: Length-based Evaluation of Fish Stock and Fishery
text: can install development version fishLengthAssess GitHub :

title: Length-based Evaluation of Fish Stock and Fishery
text: main functions package rely life histories length composition objects. life history object gathers information life history traits species (length-weight relationship, von Bertalanffy growth parameters, length 50% maturity, natural mortality, others). life history object can created R package fishSimGTG, see details . length composition object length data set can structured either raw data (.e. individual length measurements) length frequency data (.e. numbers fish per length bin). length frequency data, first column data set must contain mid-points length bins, remaining columns contain counts length class.
code: # Load the package library(fishLengthAssess)  # Example data set with length composition defined as length measurements by year knitr::kable(head(LengthCompExampleFreq@dt)) # Example data set with length composition defined as length frequencies by year knitr::kable(head(LengthCompExampleLength@dt))

what: Length-based evaluation of fish stock and fishery — fishLengthAssess
title: Length-based evaluation of fish stock and fishery — fishLengthAssess
text: Evaluates stock status fishery compliance, conducts management-related tasks based length-frequency data.

title: Length-based evaluation of fish stock and fishery — fishLengthAssess

what: Estimation of SPR using LBSPR method (Hordyk et al. 2016) — lbsprWrapper
title: Estimation of SPR using LBSPR method (Hordyk et al. 2016) — lbsprWrapper
text: Hordyk, .R., Ono, K., Prince, J.D., Walters, C.J., 2016. simple length-structured model based life history ratios incorporating size-dependent selectivity: application spawning potential ratios data-poor stocks. Can. J. Fish. Aquat. Sci. 73, 1787–1799. https://doi.org/10.1139/cjfas-2015-0422

title: Estimation of SPR using LBSPR method (Hordyk et al. 2016) — lbsprWrapper
code: lbsprWrapper(   LifeHistoryObj,   LengthCompObj,   Lc = 0,   binWidth = 1,   cvLinf = 0.1,   byGroup = FALSE,   modtype = "GTG" )

title: Estimation of SPR using LBSPR method (Hordyk et al. 2016) — lbsprWrapper
text: LifeHistoryObj LifeHistory object fishSimGTG. LengthCompObj LengthComp object Lc minimum size limit units measure (L_units) type measurement (L_type) corresponding LengthComp object. used analysis fishery-independent length composition data. binWidth Used create length-frequencies LengthComp dataType raw lengths. cvLinf Variability Linf, used LBSPR fitting. Default value used LBSPR library byGroup logical indicating whether quantity calculated separately multiple length comp groups (TRUE) length comp pooled across groups prior calculating quantity (default = FALSE). TRUE, pooling ignored single group exists.

title: Estimation of SPR using LBSPR method (Hordyk et al. 2016) — lbsprWrapper

Length composition object — LengthComp-class
text: S4 object holds length composition data specified format.

title: Length composition object — LengthComp-class
text: title title object, useful displaying contents object description longer description object L_units Units measure object, e.g., cm L_type Options TL, FL, SL (Total length, fork length, standard length, respectively) L_source Options FD FI. FD lengths frequencies catch. FI fishery independent lengths frequencies, survey research collection. dataType Options Length Frequency (See details additional information) observationGroup Provide description interpreting column header, e.g., Year header Logical. Whether dataframe contains descriptive  header. FALSE cause header hidden dt length composition data frame.

title: Length composition object — LengthComp-class
text: length composition object contains data frame length observations. observations organized according 'dataType'. 'dataType' set 'lengths', row contains length observation columns represent discrete observation units, year. 'dataType' set 'freq', row number length observations corresponding length bin. first column must contain mid-points length bin, columns 2 representing discrete observation units
